replies.ssd: The Student Service Department (SSD) is on the third floor, where you can get help and info regarding the college.
replies.cafe: If youre looking for The British Cafe its in the ground floor which is open from 8:00 AM to 5:00 PM.
replies.library: The library is open from 6:00 AM to 5:00 PM for students.
replies.sports: The uni offers facilities that include a gym, basketball court, pool tables, etc.
replies.admissions: You can find admissions information on our website or by contacting the SSD.
replies.food: The food sections are on the outside part of the building.
replies.teachers: The teachers information is available at the SSD.
replies.orbund: A platform made for TBC where teachers can share classroom information through the web
replies.agents name: The number of agents available are 5 that includes Bam, Prasun, Saurav, Son goku and shubham.
replies.ok: Is there anything i can help you with?
replies.no: Can i help you with anything else?
replies.info: The chatbot can provide informations like ssd, cafe, library, sports and much more. Can i assist with anything?

random_responses: Hmm, Good question! Let me think about.
This is not a topic regarding college, could you specify further?
I'll have a look about it
I don't know about that. Is there another way I can assist you?
Good question! But I don't have an answer about it.
Good question. I'll have to look that up.
jokes: What did one ocean say to the other ocean? Nothing, they just waved.
Did you SEA what I did there? I'm shore you did.
Why did the coffee file a police report? Because it got mugged!
Parallel lines have so much in common. Its a shame theyll never meet.
I'm reading a book on anti-gravity. It's impossible to put down!
I told my wife she should embrace her mistakes. She gave me a hug.
Why dont skeletons fight each other? They dont have the guts.
I used to hate facial hair. But then it grew on me.
Why couldn't the bicycle stand up by itself? It was two tired.
Im on a seafood diet. I see food, and I eat it.
Why was the math book sad? It had too many problems.
How does a penguin build its house? Igloos it together.
Why don't eggs tell jokes? They'd crack each other up.
What do you call fake spaghetti? An impasta!
